trans-unit.source: (Max %amount_refundable% %tax_method%)
trans-unit.target: (maximum %amount_refundable% %tax_method%)

trans-unit.source: Add an image before the product name on delivery slips.
trans-unit.target: Adauga o imagine inainte de numele produsului pe avizul de expeditie.

trans-unit.source: Adds an image in front of the product name on the invoice.
trans-unit.target: Adauga o imagine pe factura, in fata numelui produsului.

trans-unit.source: Choose an invoice model
trans-unit.target: Alege un model de factura

trans-unit.source: Do not forget to update your exchange rate before making this change.
trans-unit.target: Nu uita sa actualizezi rata de schimb inainte de a face aceasta modificare.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable customer login.
trans-unit.target: Se permite sau nu autentificarea clientului.

trans-unit.source: Format: %s (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: Format: %s (inclusiv).

trans-unit.source: Format: 2011-12-31 (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: Format: 2011-12-31 (inclusiv).

trans-unit.source: Freely definable prefix for invoice number (e.g. #IN00001).
trans-unit.target: Prefix personalizabil pentru numarul facturii (de ex. #FA00001).

trans-unit.source: How many days after the delivery date does the customer have to return a product?
trans-unit.target: Intervalul in zile in care clientul poate face o returnare, incepand de la data livrarii.

trans-unit.source: If required, show the total amount per rate of the corresponding tax.
trans-unit.target: Daca se cere, arata suma totala pe fiecare rata de TVA.

trans-unit.source: List of products in return package.
trans-unit.target: Lista produselor din pachetul de returnat.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of days to return a product after the delivery date.
trans-unit.target: Numarul maxim de zile dupa data livrarii pentru returnarea unui produs.

trans-unit.source: Merchandise return (RMA) status.
trans-unit.target: Stadiul returnarii de marfa (RMA).

trans-unit.source: Only letters and the dot (.) character, followed by a space, are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Sunt permise numai litere și puncte urmate de un spațiu (. ).

trans-unit.source: Only the discount for the selected group will be applied to this customer.
trans-unit.target: Numai reducerile tinand de grupul selectat vor fi aplicate acestui client.

trans-unit.source: Password should be at least %length% characters long.
trans-unit.target: Parola trebuie sa contina minimum %length% caractere.

trans-unit.source: Please make sure you are complying with the opt-in legislation applicable in your country.
trans-unit.target: Asigura-te ca respecti legislatia referitoare la mesajele comerciale aplicabila in tara ta.

trans-unit.source: Prefix used for credit slips.
trans-unit.target: Prefixul folosit pentru notele de credit.

trans-unit.source: Prefix used for delivery slips.
trans-unit.target: Prefix utilizat pentru avizul de livrare.

trans-unit.source: Prefix used for merchandise returns (e.g. RE00001).
trans-unit.target: Prefix utilizat pentru retururi de marfa (de ex. RE00001).

trans-unit.source: Prefix used for return name (e.g. RE00001).
trans-unit.target: Prefixul folosit pentru numele returnarii (ex. RE00001).

trans-unit.source: Required fields apply to the customer's registration form, you should check the address formats in [1]International > Locations > Countries[/1] before.
trans-unit.target: Casete obligatorii in formularul de inregistrare a clientului. In prealabil, formatele de adresa ar trebui verificate in [1]IMBUNATATESTE > International > Locatii > Tari[/1].

trans-unit.source: Saves memory but slows down the PDF generation.
trans-unit.target: Salveaza memorie, dar incetineste procesul de generare a fisierului PDF.

trans-unit.source: Search for an existing customer by typing the first letters of his/her name.
trans-unit.target: Cauta un client existent introducand primele litere din numele lui/ei.

trans-unit.source: Search for an existing product by typing the first letters of its name.
trans-unit.target: Cauta un produs existent introducand primele litere din nume.

trans-unit.source: Select all the groups that you would like to apply to this customer.
trans-unit.target: Selecteaza toate grupurile in care vrei sa incluzi acest client.

trans-unit.source: Select the fields you would like to be required for this section.
trans-unit.target: Selecteaza campurile care doresti sa fie obligatorii pentru aceasta sectiune.

trans-unit.source: The link is only available after validation and before the parcel gets delivered.
trans-unit.target: Linkul este valabil numai dupa validare si inainte de livrarea coletului.

trans-unit.source: The next delivery slip will begin with this number and then increase with each additional slip.
trans-unit.target: Urmatorul aviz de livrare va incepe cu acest numar si apoi va fi incrementat cu fiecare aviz aditional.

trans-unit.source: The next invoice will begin with this number, and then increase with each additional invoice. Set to 0 if you want to keep the current number (which is #%number%).
trans-unit.target: Urmatoarea factura va incepe cu acest numar, apoi numarul va creste cu fiecare factura aditionala. Seteaza la 0 daca doresti pastrarea numarului curent (care este #%number%).

trans-unit.source: This customer will receive your ads via email.
trans-unit.target: Acest client va primi comunicarile tale promotionale prin e-mail.

trans-unit.source: This customer will receive your newsletter via email.
trans-unit.target: Acest client va primi buletinul tau de stiri prin e-mail.

trans-unit.source: This group will be the user's default group.
trans-unit.target: Acest grup va fi grupul implicit al utilizatorului.

trans-unit.source: This note will be displayed to all employees but not to customers.
trans-unit.target: Aceasta nota va fi afisata tuturor angajatilor dar nu si clientilor.

trans-unit.source: This text will appear at the bottom of the invoice, below your company details.
trans-unit.target: Acest text va aparea in partea de jos a facturii, sub detaliile companiei tale.

trans-unit.source: Use OR to broaden your search
trans-unit.target: Utilizeaza SAU pentru a extinde cautarea

trans-unit.source: Use this field to show additional information on the invoice such as specific legal information. It will be displayed below the payment methods summary.
trans-unit.target: Utilizeaza acest camp pentru a insera un text suplimentar pe factura, cum ar fi informatii juridice specifice. Acesta va fi inserat sub rezumatul metodelor de plata.

trans-unit.source: Valid characters:
trans-unit.target: Caractere permise:

trans-unit.source: View details on the customer page
trans-unit.target: Vezi detaliile in pagina clientului

trans-unit.source: View details on the order page
trans-unit.target: Vezi detaliile in pagina comenzii

trans-unit.source: When enabled, your customers will receive an invoice for the purchase.
trans-unit.target: Daca optiunea este activa, clientii vor primi facturi pentru achizitii.

trans-unit.source: Would you like to allow merchandise returns in your shop?
trans-unit.target: Selecteaza daca doresti sau nu sa activezi returnarile de produse pentru magazin.

trans-unit.source: You can add a comment here.
trans-unit.target: Poti adauga un comentariu aici.

trans-unit.source: You can also export orders which have not been charged yet.
trans-unit.target: Se pot exporta si comenzile pentru care inca nu au fost creditat contul clientului.

trans-unit.source: [1]Make[/1] sure you enable partner offers in the [2]Shop Parameters > Customer Settings[/2] section of the back office before requiring them. Otherwise, new customers won't be able to create an account and [1]proceed[/1] to checkout.
trans-unit.target: [1]Asigura-te[/1] ca activezi ofertele partenerilor in sectiunea [2]Parametri operationali > Clienti[/2] din back office inainte de a le face obligatorii. In caz contrar, noii clienti nu vor putea crea un cont si [1]continua[/1] to spre finalizare.
